name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 082
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Squid Game and Chillin. Which is what I’m assuming everyone has been doing for the past couple of weeks. Colors inspired by the Squid Game on Netflix.
